posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 设置文章首行缩进1在文字前用 &emsp ;代表空格

posts.title: 中华田园蟹的博客之路
posts.text: 勿在浮沙筑高台    中华田园蟹的博客之路。     毕业两年，又经历一番面试，顿感自身知识过于匮乏。想要在一个行业深耕前行，必须在平时多积累，否则必将被时代所抛弃。有感于此，故开此博客记平日之所惑，积工作之所获，录闲时之所学。     少年无奇才，唯恒心尔。
